mapper.select:
SELECT CAR_CODE ,CAR_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS REG_DT FROM CAR WHERE 1 = 1
AND CAR_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
AND CAR_CODE = #{carCode}
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC

SELECT A.ITEM_NO, B.ITEM_NM, A.MON, A.SUM_CNT, C.CAR_NM FROM CAR_MON_SUM A LEFT OUTER JOIN item B ON A.item_no =B.item_no INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.ITEM_NO ,GROUP_CONCAT(B.CAR_NM SEPARATOR '|') AS CAR_NM FROM CAR_ITEM A INNER JOIN CAR B ON A.CAR_CODE =B.CAR_CODE GROUP BY ITEM_NO ) C ON A.ITEM_NO=C.ITEM_NO WHERE A.MON =#{mon}
AND A.CAR_CODE = #{carCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAR_MON_SUM( MON ,ITEM_NO ,SUM_CNT ,REG_DT ) SELECT A.MON ,B.ITEM_NO , SUM(CNT), NOW() FROM CAR_MON_CNT A INNER JOIN CAR_ITEM B ON A.CAR_CODE =B.CAR_CODE WHERE A.MON=#{mon} GROUP BY A.MON ,B.ITEM_NO
mapper.select:
SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_NM, ITEM_KIND, OEM_PRICE , AS_PRICE , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS REG_DT FROM ITEM where 1=1
AND item_no=#{itemNo}

SELECT B.CAR_CODE , B.CAR_NM, 'CHK' CHECKED FROM CAR_ITEM A INNER JOIN CAR B ON A.CAR_CODE =B.CAR_CODE WHERE A.ITEM_NO =#{itemNo} UNION ALL SELECT B.CAR_CODE , B.CAR_NM, '' CHECKED FROM CAR B WHERE CAR_CODE NOT IN ( SELECT B.CAR_CODE FROM CAR_ITEM A INNER JOIN CAR B ON A.CAR_CODE =B.CAR_CODE WHERE A.ITEM_NO =#{itemNo} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM_RCAR_SUM(MON, ITEM_NO, SUM_CNT, REG_DT) SELECT A.MON, A.ITEM_NO, SUM(A.CNT), NOW() FROM ITEM_MON_RCAR A INNER JOIN ITEM B ON A.ITEM_NO=B.ITEM_NO WHERE A.MON=#{mon} GROUP BY A.MON, A.ITEM_NO

INSERT INTO ITEM_CKD_SUM(MON, ITEM_NO, SUM_CNT, REG_DT) SELECT A.MON, A.ITEM_NO, SUM(A.CNT), NOW() FROM ITEM_MON_CKD A INNER JOIN ITEM B ON A.ITEM_NO=B.ITEM_NO WHERE A.MON=#{mon} GROUP BY A.MON, A.ITEM_NO

INSERT INTO ITEM_AS_SUM(MON, ITEM_NO, SUM_CNT, REG_DT) SELECT A.MON, A.ITEM_NO, SUM(A.CNT), NOW() FROM ITEM_MON_AS A INNER JOIN ITEM B ON A.ITEM_NO=B.ITEM_NO WHERE A.MON=#{mon} GROUP BY A.MON, A.ITEM_NO

INSERT INTO ITEM_MOBIS_SUM(MON, ITEM_NO, SUM_CNT, REG_DT) SELECT A.MON ,A.ITEM_NO ,SUM(A.CNT) ,NOW() FROM ITEM_MON_MOBIS A INNER JOIN ITEM B ON A.ITEM_NO=B.ITEM_NO WHERE A.MON=#{mon} GROUP BY A.MON, A.ITEM_NO
mapper.select: SELECT TT2.CAR_NM ,ITEM_KIND ,TT1.ITEM_NO ,ITEM_NM ,OEM_PRICE ,AS_PRICE ,CAR_CNT ,CKD_CNT ,RCAR_CNT ,AS_CNT ,MOBIS_CNT ,TOTAL_CNT ,CASE WHEN MOBIS_CNT=0 THEN OEM_PRICE*TOTAL_CNT ELSE OEM_PRICE*MOBIS_CNT END OEM_TOTAL_PRICE ,AS_PRICE*AS_CNT AS_TOTAL_PRICE ,CASE WHEN MOBIS_CNT=0 THEN (OEM_PRICE*TOTAL_CNT)+(AS_PRICE*AS_CNT) ELSE (OEM_PRICE*MOBIS_CNT)+(AS_PRICE*AS_CNT) END TOTAL_PRICE FROM ( SELECT T2.ITEM_KIND ,T2.ITEM_NO ,T2.ITEM_NM ,IFNULL(T2.OEM_PRICE, 0) OEM_PRICE ,IFNULL(T2.AS_PRICE, 0) AS_PRICE ,IFNULL(T3.CAR_CNT, 0) CAR_CNT ,IFNULL(T4.CKD_CNT, 0) CKD_CNT ,IFNULL(T5.RCAR_CNT, 0) RCAR_CNT ,IFNULL(T6.AS_CNT, 0) AS_CNT ,IFNULL(T7.MOBIS_CNT, 0) MOBIS_CNT , IFNULL(T3.CAR_CNT, 0)+IFNULL(T4.CKD_CNT, 0)+IFNULL(T5.RCAR_CNT, 0) TOTAL_CNT from ITEM T2 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ITEM_NO, SUM_CNT CAR_CNT FROM CAR_MON_SUM WHERE MON=#{mon} ) T3 ON T2.ITEM_NO=T3.ITEM_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ITEM_NO, SUM_CNT CKD_CNT FROM ITEM_CKD_SUM WHERE MON=#{mon} ) T4 ON T2.ITEM_NO=T4.ITEM_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ITEM_NO, SUM_CNT RCAR_CNT FROM ITEM_RCAR_SUM WHERE MON=#{mon} ) T5 ON T2.ITEM_NO=T5.ITEM_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ITEM_NO, SUM_CNT AS_CNT FROM ITEM_AS_SUM WHERE MON=#{mon} ) T6 ON T2.ITEM_NO=T6.ITEM_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ITEM_NO, SUM_CNT mobis_CNT FROM item_mobis_sum WHERE MON=#{mon} ) T7 ON T2.ITEM_NO=T7.ITEM_NO ) as TT1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.ITEM_NO ,GROUP_CONCAT(B.CAR_NM SEPARATOR '|') AS CAR_NM FROM CAR_ITEM A INNER JOIN CAR B ON A.CAR_CODE =B.CAR_CODE GROUP BY ITEM_NO ) AS TT2 ON TT1.ITEM_NO=TT2.ITEM_NO ORDER BY MOBIS_CNT ASC
